data.name: TAROTICA VOO DOO - HELL MODE
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to 'HELL MODE' of TAROTICA VOO DOO, for those brave warriors who
wield perfect control of their swords.

This mode has a severe time limit, so you must maneuver precisely and rapidly in order to save the residents of the mansion!
If you take your time, the airplane will crash and everyone will die!

This mode is specially designed for those who have full and thorough knowledge of all the nooks and intricacies of TAROTICA.
Do you dare to challenge HELL MODE without saving or loading the game??

Instructions


This is a free DLC included with TAROTICA VOO DOO.

(Note: Pressing the "Download" button on this page just seems to start up the main game. Instead, please follow the method described below in order to access the DLC.)
1. Select TAROTICA VOO DOO in your Steam Library and install this DLC.
2. Select TAROTICA VOO DOO in your Steam Library and press the PLAY button.
3. A selection window will appear. Select "TAROTICA VOO DOO - HELL MODE"
and press PLAY .

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 10
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 10 MB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
